content:
Craft an item of type: magenta_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 39, "index": 11}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 2, "index": 20}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "beacon", "quantity": 58, "index": 34}]
thought: To craft the magenta carpet, I first need to move one of the two magenta wool blocks from slot 20 into the crafting grid. Slot 1 is in the top left corner of the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: magenta_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 39, "index": 11}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "beacon", "quantity": 58, "index": 34}]

thought: Since the first magenta wool block has been placed in the top left corner, I now need to place another magenta wool block in the top right corner. Slot 2 is in the top right corner of the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 20 to slot 2 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: magenta_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "magenta_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "nether_wart", "quantity": 39, "index": 11}, {"type": "jigsaw", "quantity": 14, "index": 18}, {"type": "fox_spawn_egg", "quantity": 21, "index": 25}, {"type": "beacon", "quantity": 58, "index": 34}]
thought: Now I can craft the magenta carpet by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 12).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 12 with quantity 3
